casebody.data:
E. B. Conover et al., appellees, v. Vandalia Railroad Company, appellant.Gen. No. 6,571.Action against a carrier to recover for damage to corn caused by delay in transit. Judgment for plaintiffs. Appeal from the Circuit Court of Peoria county; the Hon. John M. Niehaus, Judge, presiding. Heard in this court at the April term, 1918.Affirmed on remittitur.Opinion filed October 10, 1918.

Niehaus, J., took no part.

Page, Hunter & Page and Graham & Graham, for appellant; Charles R. Webber, Morrison R. Waite and William A. Eggers, of counsel. H. L. Child, for appellees; Wilson, Warren & Child and Heyl & Heyl, of counsel. Mr. Justice Carnes

delivered the opinion of the court.
